title: auto fill is a horrible idea
body: so just now i played a game where your support was obviously auto filled into the role and he didnt want to do it at all so in fact he didnt, he took smite farmed the jungle, which in turn got our actual jungler as well as him grossly under leveled, hung our adc out to dry while there jungler invaded out jungle as he wished and got fed off of our 2 under leveled junglers. i would much rather have long wait times then have someone stuck into a role they dont want to play and then troll the game away to a loss because of it.

replies.body: Autofill is just another worthless mechanic that increases player toxicity, and now it seems to have come to low elo. It cant last long with more than a handful of people experiencing it now.

I think riot are downvoting us like my post got 30 downvotes for saying autofill is bad....
like i don't have a problem playing wherever but what if my teammate gets support and he never played support before and we are in ranked does that mean I have to lose that game which probably will happen ?

Autofill sucks. It was a primary reason why i didn't climb higher this season than D5.. 
Norms? I was getting autofilled regularly in norms most the season :/ i just played Kayle and kept going :/
I wouldn't be surprised to learn that all the people bitching most about it are the ones who swear supports just get carried.
lmfao no kidding a good support will win a game, people are just way to concerned about being the carry as opposed to being the utility
im perfectly fine with autofill simply becuase i enjoy playing ALL ROLES and not just one or two.
oh dont get me wrong im ok with being auto fill i have no problem playing any role but its the people who arnt that get filled that rune it

Considering I generally just read or watch a video while in queue, I would have not issues with longer wait times.

Even with autofill enabled, I am generally waiting 7-10 minutes to find a match anyways.  Another couple of minutes wouldn't hurt me in the least.

It's only really necessary for diamond and up ranked games. 

I've actually never been autofilled once except for today.
I did get it and Im silver 3.. If I didn't want to wait I would pick fill as secondary. Riot are going full retard I hope they get rid of normal draft so I can finally stop playing.
